title: Kadhal Kanave Lyrics Mundasupatti Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kadhal Kanave
Singer(s): Pradeep Kumar, Kalyani Nair
Music: Sean Roldan
Movie: Mundasupatti

Kadhal kanave thalli pogaadhe pogaadhe
aasa marachi oliyadhe odaadhe. (2)

Kaniye unna kaana kaathuirukken
adiye vazhi naanum paarthirukken.
thenaadiyil neeraadudhe maname
oh poovaliyil nee thoonga vaa dhinamey.

Kadhal kanave thalli pogaadhe pogaadhe
Sethraaama siru mozhi pesu
sirippale narukkunu oosi
padhichaale paravasamaanen sogamaa.

Siru noolaa thuniyil irundhu
thaniyaaga velagi vilundhu
manam ingu elagi pochu medhuvaa.

Iragaala padaga neendndhi
kaththil naanum medhandheney.
kadivaalam kudhiraiyaaga enna thaan
neeyum iluththaaye.

Maaraadhu maname maaney
madi meley  vilundhaen naaney.

Kadhal kanave thalli pogaadhe pogaadhe
aasa marachi oliyadhe odaadhe.

Paruvaththil paniyum senjen
paniyaama medhuvaa ninjen.
pudhuvegam eduthe nadandhaen thaniye

Uruvaththa nizhalaa pudichen
uravaaga kanavula paddhichen
unakkaaga nesamaa thudichen mayile.

Iravodu pagala sera
maalai thaedi irundheney.
kannaadi thotti meenaa
naanum unna paarthaeney.

Maaraadhu maname maaney
madi meley  vilundhaen naaney.

Kadhal kanave thalli pogaadhe pogaadhe
aasa marachi oliyadhe odaadhe.

Kaniye unna kaana kaathuirukken
adiye vazhi naanum paarthirukken.
thenaadiyil neeraadudhe maname
oh poovaliyil nee thoonga vaa dhinamey.
